title: Border, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked ground
dimensions: H x W: 8 x 173 cm (3 1/8 in. x 5 ft. 8 1/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Symmetrical scrolls surmounted by floral sprays, alternating with repeated design of inverted floral sprays. Fond: brides bouclée with fond de neige. Modes: venises, portes, enchainettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked ground. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-78.
